message.content:
cs.DS, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.AR, cs.DC. 

The paper proposes a technique to improve the repair performance in erasure-coded storage systems, which is a topic related to distributed systems and data storage. Therefore, cs.DS (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) and cs.DC (Data Structures and Algorithms) are the most likely categories. The paper also discusses the design of different variants of repair pipelining algorithms, which involves system optimization and control, making cs.SY (Systems and Control) a likely category as well. Additionally, the paper evaluates the proposed technique through experiments, which falls under cs.AR (Hardware Architecture) and cs.DC (Data Structures and Algorithms).
